title: Stand Still, Stay Silent, Book 2
description: An underfunded, questionably selected, rag-tag team of explorers are assembled and launched into the unknown in a search for information and relics of the Old World - hopefully valuable relics. Stand Still. Stay Silent. follows six people (and a cat) on a journey filled with adventure, camaraderie and Nordic mythology. Who knows what they might find on their journey... and what they might lose.Contain Chapters 6 to 10 of the ongoing webcomic and bonus content.
author: Minna Sundberg
